Now tell me whatcha gonna do when there ain't no where to run
When judgment comes for you, when judgment comes for you
Tell me whatcha gonna do when there ain't no where to hide
When judgment comes for you 'coz it's gonna come for you

                                      Crossroads - Bone Thugs & Harmony


Inside a dark chamber a single figure lurks, crism optics peering out
into the darkness. He is thinking, planing, carefully analyzing his
next move. A careful chess player looking for the next step on his way
to the inevitable checkmate against perhaps his most difficult
opponant when . . .

A commuciation line opened  and the clearing of a mechainic throat.
"Lord Cryotek . . . Sir you have a visitor."

"What do you mean a visitor?" There was a confused reply from CRYOTEK
as he listened to JETSTORM, one of his servants. "How could they get
in here without being announced?"

There was a pause, "Sir, he just . . . appeared . . . " JETSTORM's
voice stopped mid sentence and then the the sound of metal hitting
metal, an energon surge and then silence.

CRYOTEK stood, his optics flaring in anger as he brought up the lights
and pressed as button that would open the door that seperated him from
JETSTORM.

As the door slid open to reveal the ante chamber there was a large red
seeker with black and silver highlights standing, his optics
glimmering in the dimmness of the room. JETSTORM was dropping to the
floor completely offline, some sort of puncture marks surrounded his
spark chamber.

The seeker straighted as he looked at CRYOTEK, "I am Animus, first
Blade of VORPAL." As the seeker rose to his full hieght, he was nearly
eight feet tall. Not quite as tall as CRYOTEK himself, but clearly an
imposing height.

As the seeker spoke of VORPRAL a look of fear went across CRYOTEK's
face, only to be covered by mock disdain. "And what does he want here
Seeker?!?"

ANIMUS smiled cruelly, "You have stolen what is his and we are coming
to collect."

"And you think you can just walk in here and just take them?" CRYOTEK
said as he opened his communicator. "Obsidian, Tankor, Strika, report
to my chambers, now!"

As ANIMUS talked two other seekers much like him came in, one colored
very much like ANIMUS only it was blue with red and sliver and the
other was mostly white with light blue and red on the chest and wings.
Each of the seekers was carrying glowing spheres of energy.

ANIMUS shook his head, "I do not think they will be answering you at this time."

A look of fear finally showed own CRYOTEK's face, "But . . but . . how?"

"You don't think Vorpral left them without failsafes built in do you?"
ANIMUS said as the other seekers took their place next to him. "They
were as easy to retrieve as entering in an access code."

There was laughter from the other two seekers, cruel and wicked as
they looked at CRYOTEK.

Raising arm cannons the seekers took aim on the draconic looking
CRYOTEK, "And now for Vorpal wished us to send you his greetings as
well!" ANIMUS said with a certain amount of grim humor.

With that they opened fire on CRYOTEK and the whole room errupted in flames!

As the smoke cleared CRYOTEK was no where to be scene.

With a nod ANIMUS and the two other seekers vanished. ANIMUS himslef
reached down to the form of JETSTROM with a device and a glowing
sphere rose from him as well . . . his spark. He looked at it well
satisfied.

And then he too vanished.

(No Tags and No need to respond)

-Preston
